body.p:
Harrodburg Ky
Jany 15 1862
Gov -- B. Magoffin

Enclosed I send petition of the bearer Chas Petty, who seeks at your hands Executive clemency you will please give the case immediate attention, as I think it a meritorious one, and extend to him such clemency as justice and your since of official duty. .
